snippet: The accord would end a three-and-a-half-month walkout in Joliet, Ill., but local union leaders called for its rejection.
abstract: Caterpillar and the International Association of Machinists reach a tentative six-year settlement that could end a three-and-a-half-month strike at the company's plant in Joliet, Ill., but local union leaders are calling for its rejection.
lead_paragraph: The accord would end a three-and-a-half-month walkout in Joliet, Ill., but local union leaders called for its rejection.

headline.main: Ratification of Union’s Deal With Caterpillar May Face Difficulties
headline.print_headline: Tentative Pact Reached In Strike at Caterpillar
